item.title: GFDL
item.description: We study an Ocean mixed layer and an Atmospheric boundary layer using the Parallel LES Model (PALM).

item.title: Cloud Physics Laboratory
item.description: In the Cloud Physics Laboratory, we make measurements of physical/chemical properties of atmospheric aerosols, cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) distributions, cloud droplet and precipitation drop distributions.

item.title: Research
item.description: Cloud Pysics Laboratory (http://cloud.yonsei.ac.kr) In the Cloud Physics Laboratory, we make measurements of physical/chemical properties of atmospheric aerosols, cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) distributions, cloud droplet and precipitation drop distributions.
